ygData.subject: RE: Jewelry - what are you wearing?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... wear the star ruby veil and just keep the guise in your inventory, right-click at will. ... very very very very rare and pricey trade. did they say for
ygData.messageBody:
> I'm currently wearing my Guise of the Deceiver, as it offers 13cha and
> 7magic resistance. The 9/9 is tempting, but it'd cause a
> hassle whenever
> night fell.

wear the star ruby veil and just keep the guise in your inventory,
right-click at will.

>
> Lately, missed notes have been aggrivating me to no end. My
> current wish
> is to pick up a cloak of shadows, but I don't see that
> happening anytime
> soon.

very very very very rare and pricey trade.

did they say for sure that dex makes us miss notes less? i read GZ said it
had absolutely nothing to do with casters regaining concentration, though we
have no channeling skill like them.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
